title: [Enhancement] Add logging to storage operations for debugging and audit

plan.description: Add module-level logger to TodoStorage using Python's logging library. Log key operations (load/save start/completion, file sizes, errors) at appropriate levels.

tdd_sequence.description: Create test_storage_logging.py with failing tests for logging on load/save operations
Add module-level logger to storage.py and implement logging in load/save methods
implementation: Add INFO log at start of load() with file path
Add INFO log after successful load with record count
Add INFO log at start of save() with record count
Add INFO log after successful save with file path and size
Add ERROR logging in exception handlers before raising

verification_commands: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/storage.py tests/test_storage_logging.py

implementation.summary: Added module-level logger and INFO/ERROR level logging for load/save operations
